messages.title: Who will stand up for the Highlands?
messages.content: The Lib Dems, whose MPs have a proud record of fighting for the Highlands

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Lib Dem MP will be a community champion and will not be forced to obey party bosses.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two horse race between the Lib Dems and SNP. Conservatives and Labour can't win.

quotes.text: Conservatives can't win Tories face wipeout in Scotland

images.caption: A Lib Dem MP will be a community champion - an SNP MP will be forced to obey party bosses.
It's a two horse race between the Lib Dems and SNP. Conservatives and Labour can't win.

leaflet.additionalNotes: In large parts of Scotland only the Lib Dems can stop the SNP. Voting Conservative or Labour will only split the vote, allowing the SNP to sneak through the middle and win.
